_instructions._comment: This is a template for creating new BentoBox content files.
_steps: 1. Copy this file and rename it to your bento ID (e.g., 'my-product.json')
2. Fill in all required fields (marked with *)
3. Remove optional fields you don't need
5. Save the file in this directory (components/BentoBox/content/)
6. Import and use with BentoBoxFromContent component

_variants.service: For high-tier consulting services with price + CTAs
_variants.link: For navigation cards linking to other pages
_variants.product: For product showcase cards with custom footers

_id_notes: * REQUIRED. Kebab-case, unique across all bentos. Used for linking and identification.
_enabled_notes: Set to false to temporarily hide this bento without deleting the file.
athenaPrompt: Contextual question that appears in Athena chat banner when this bento is in viewport?
_athenaPrompt_notes: Optional. Prompt shown in Athena chat when this bento scrolls into view. Should be conversational and invite engagement (e.g., 'Want to see how this works? Ask Athena.'). Max 100 chars.

metadata.author: Your Name
metadata.notes: Internal notes about this bento (not shown to users)

prompt._text_notes: The problem/hook that appears at the top with red accent bar. Max 200 chars.
prompt._dynamicKey_notes: Only needed if type='dynamic'. Key from data/dynamic-content.json

content.title: Your Bento Title
content._title_notes: * REQUIRED. Shown in uppercase. Max 100 chars.
content._badge_notes: Optional small label next to title (e.g., 'Strategy', 'Technology').

body._text_notes: Main body content. Aim for 2-4 sentences per paragraph.

body.text: Second paragraph expanding on the value proposition...
Third paragraph with specific outcomes or benefits...

content._body_notes: Array of paragraphs. Max 5 paragraphs recommended for readability.

metadata._text_notes: Timeline/duration info. Appears in italics above footer. Use {variables} for dynamic content.
metadata._variables_notes: Optional. Replace {placeholder} in text with dynamic values.

content._metadata_notes: Optional timeline/delivery information shown above the footer.

footer._comment: Choose ONE footer type based on your variant:
footer._option_A: For service/link bentos with price + CTAs:
footer._option_B: For product bentos with custom messaging:
footer._primaryText_notes: Main footer message. Bold, 18px. Max 60 chars.

actions._notes: Define what happens when users interact with CTAs. All optional.

share._enabled_notes: Set to true to show 'Share' link that opens email client.
share.subject: Worth looking at: {title}
share._subject_notes: Email subject line. {title} auto-replaced with bento title.

enquire._enabled_notes: Set to true to show 'Enquire' button that opens modal.
enquire._modalId_notes: ID passed to enquiry modal. Used for form pre-fill.
enquire._buttonText_notes: Optional. Defaults to 'Enquire'. Can customize (e.g., 'Get Started').

link._enabled_notes: Set to true for navigation cards (variant='link').
link._href_notes: URL to navigate to. Can be internal (/page) or external (https://...).

custom._handler_notes: Function name to call. Must be defined in page context.
custom.label: Custom Action

style._notes: Optional style overrides. Use sparingly - defaults are designed for consistency.
style._border_example: Only for special emphasis (e.g., featured navigation cards).
style._backgroundColor_notes: Default is white. Rarely needs changing.

_beforeSaving: 2. Remove unused optional fields (e.g., if no badge, delete 'badge' key)
3. Ensure JSON is valid (no trailing commas, proper quotes)
